DOC.brief_summary: This study design identify minimal effective test dose fruit extract consume bread provide reduction venous post-prandial blood glucose compare reference bread .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Natural Extract Post-prandial Blood Glucose Response After Bread Consumption : Dose-response Efficacy
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.0 ≤ 30.0 kg/m2 . Apparently healthy male female : medical condition might affect study measurement include diabetes type 1 type 2 , gastrointestinal dysfunction , gastrointestinal surgery inflammatory disease . Fasting blood glucose value subject ≥ 3.4 ≤ 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62110 mg/dl ) screening . Exclusion criterion : Use antibiotic within 3 month day 1 ; use medication except paracetamol , within 14 day day 1 . Blood donation past 3 month and/or study . Reported intense sporting activity > 10 h/week . Consumption > 14 unit ( female subject ) > 21 unit ( male subject ) alcoholic drink typical week . Reported dietary habit : medically prescribe diet , slimming diet , use eat 3 meal day , vegetarian . If female , pregnant ( pregnant last < 3 month ) plan pregnancy study period . If female , lactate lactate 6 week screen and/or study period . Dislike , know allergy intolerance test product food product provide study .
